titles.title: To ensure receipt of all health insurance benefits to which a member of a union is entitled.
To ensure receipt of all health insurance benefits to which a member of a union is entitled.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary: This bill requires that all monies designated for union health insurance plans or funds be, without exception, fully reciprocated to a worker's home health plan or fund.
